bibRefCitation.author: Sladen WP
bibRefCitation.refString: Sladen WP. 1889. Asteroidea. Report of the Scientific Results of H. M S Challenger 30: 1 - 893.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species
:
Pholidaster squamatus Sladen, 1889
(designated by Fisher, 1919a ).

Diagnosis : Disc and arm plates imbricate. Disc and arms covered by flattened scales covering nearly all plates save for the carinal arm series and primary circlet on disc. Carinal plates along arms bare. Superambulacral plates reduced. Internal buttress absent. Pedicellariae absent.

bibRefCitation.author: Sladen WP
bibRefCitation.refString: Sladen WP. 1889. Asteroidea. Report of the Scientific Results of H. M S Challenger 30: 1 - 893.
